space-rocket-up.name: Space Rocket: UP
space-rocket-up.shortDescription: Fly UP, collect coins and blast your way though walls in this entry to Indies VS Gamers.

circle-shooter.name: Circle Shooter
circle-shooter.shortDescription: Shoot circles, avoid circles, be better than your circles, uh, friends!

buttonActions.name: Get on it Windows Phone Store

banana-clicker.name: Banana Clicker
banana-clicker.shortDescription: Made for 0 hour game jam 2013. Click the bananas!

knight-time.name: Knight Time
knight-time.shortDescription: Made for Ludum Dare 27 with the theme '10 Seconds'. Run to the right side while hitting stuff

shape-attack.name: Shape Attack
shape-attack.shortDescription: Made for Ludum Dare 26 with the theme 'Minimalism'. Be shapes shooting shapes with a green laser

my-evil-lair.name: My Evil Lair
my-evil-lair.tagline: Protect the left side from white squares!
my-evil-lair.shortDescription: Made for Ludum Dare 25 with the theme 'You are the Villain'. Protect the left side from the boxes!

league-of-fish.name: League of Fish
league-of-fish.shortDescription: Made for Ludum Dare 24 with the theme 'Evolution'. 'Spore inspired' eat things sim
